channel.title: Hello World
channel.itunes:summary: Hello World is a 30 minutes daily show on LearnTV. Hello World is made up of special guests, content challenges, upcoming events, and daily updates from Microsoft related news. Come for a specific segment, please stay for the energy. Hello World is meant to be fun and educational to the viewing audience who are interested in Microsoft products and Microsoft current events. Visualize this show like your national morning talk show. A regular cast of hosts, who then work on with others to build and deliver short and concise 2-5 minute segments of interest. Watch it live on LearnTV Add the Hello World show schedule to your calendar with this Invite - https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder.
channel.googleplay:author: Microsoft Developer Relations

item.title: Hello World: Thursday May 27, 2021 - Special 1 hour
item.description:
Today we have a special double time! One hour of update and news for you. Nitya and Frank welcome many guests to shares some of the greatest update after Microsoft Build! And of course we will play our game A, B, See!

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld

Welcome and News [00:24]

  • DevRel Collection: https://aka.ms/devcollection
  • Community Pages: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/javascript/
  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/java/
  • What's New For the M365 Developer at Build: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/blogs/whats-new-in-microsoft-365-platform-at-build-2021/
  • Power Apps Developer Plan: https://powerapps.microsoft.com/en-us/developerplan
  • Power Apps Ideas. https://blogs.microsoft.com/ai/from-conversation-to-code-microsoft-introduces-its-first-product-features-powered-by-gpt-3
  • Book Of News: https://news.microsoft.com/build-2021-book-of-news/

Let's recap Developer News at Build with Isaac Levin [00:09:42]

  • Azure Confidential Ledger with Dean Bryen - https://aka.ms/confidentialledger

Azure Confidential Ledger with Dean Bryen [00:20:26]

Cloud Skills Challenge Update with Navin Chand [00:30:36]

  • Build Cloud Skills Challenge: https://aka.ms/buildcsc

Certifications - AZ400 with Brian Benz [00:35:57]

Lets talk to about the 1:1 consultations with Priyanka [00:41:03]

File New Project with Scott Hanselman [00:45:46]

  • Reach out to Ifeoma Imoh on Twitter @iphiee_omah and on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxPaN6CXAGX1NNa-2ATU5bg

 ABSee with Nitya Narasimhan [00:51:33]

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback

item.title: Hello World: Tuesday May 25, 2021
item.description:
In this very special episode the #HelloWorld our hosts welcomes many different guests to talk about some fresh news just announced at #Microsoft #Build in this extended episode.
 
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld    
 
Welcome and News [00:25]

  • Book of News: https://news.microsoft.com/build-2021-book-of-news 
  • Introducing Power Apps Ideas: https://powerapps.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/introducing-power-apps-ideas-ai-powered-assistance-now-helps-anyone-create-apps-using-natural-language 
  • Learning Path about Fusion: https://aka.ms/fusiondevpath 
 
Imagine Cup [09:52]
 
Brand Strategy under Cloud Marketing [16:16]
  • Build the skills that build careers: https://aka.ms/TrainingAndCertification 
Solving Issues with Python Scope [27:42]
  • May 20201 release for the Python Extension for VS Code: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/python/python-in-visual-studio-code-may-2021-release/
  • Python Extension for VS Code: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python
 
Dev Problem Solving: Durable Functions Memory and Serialization [52:32]
  • Events pages on Docs: http://docs.microsoft.com/events 
  • Serverless solutions on Azure: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/serverless 
  • Azure Function documentation: http://gslb.ch/c580s 
  • Overview of Durable Functions: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-functions/durable/durable-functions-overview 
  • Durable Functions Application Patterns: http://gslb.ch/c581s 
  • Diagnostics tools: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-functions/functions-diagnostic 
Cosmos DB - Book of News [01:14:28]
  • Announced at Build: new capabilities for data security and workload optimization: https://aka.ms/helloworld/cosmosdb 
Platform .NET Interactive [01:26:04]
  • GitHub repo with all the information: https://github.com/dotnet/interactive 
Dev Problem Solving: Automating Microsoft Identity [01:35:42]
 

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback

item.title: Hello World: Thursday May 13, 2021
item.description:
In today #HelloWorldLive episode, we will learn more about Azure Static Web App, Azure Function Custom Binding, #VisualStudio tips and tricks to customize our experience, the Azure Developer #Certification Az-204. We will finish with our favorite game ABSee when we try to guess right the sketchnote of Nitya and of course answer YOUR questions from the chat!

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld   

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback
 
Welcome and News [00:31]
  • Azure Static Web Apps GA Announcement 
  • Great Learning path to get started on Azure Static Web Apps
  • Security Unlocked: CISO Series with Bret Arsenaut
Azure Tips and Tricks [04:46]
  • Azure Tips and Tricks - Find out more about today's tip at https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks
Certification All Up [10:16]
  • Find all certifications at https://aka.ms/learn  
Visual Studio Tips and Tricks [15:16]
  • Watch more videos on: https://aka.ms/vstips 
ABSee [20:37]
  • Interested in testing your tech IQ? Check out our puzzles archives at https://aka.ms/visual/a-b-see
  • Learn how the puzzle was crafted, and where you can learn more about the concept, product - or person - we featured!

Chat Questions

  • #VisualizeIT Workshop series https://aka.ms/visualize-it
  • SketchTheDocs twitter: https://twitter.com/sketchthedocs
Useful Links
  • ‎Hello World on Spotify: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-spotify
  • ‎Hello World on Google Podcasts: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-google
  • ‎Hello World on Apple Podcasts: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-apple
  • Join us Backstage: https://aka.ms/HelloWorld/BackStage
  • iCal URL: https://aka.ms/helloworld/reminder

item.title: Hello World: Friday May 7, 2021
item.description:
We're back for an amazing Friday episode of Hello World! Today Jeff Fritz joined us to talk about What's new in .NET, Chloe Condon talks to Locksley Kolakowski about Sketchnotes, Rochelle Sonnenberg is joined by MVP Harjit Dhaliwal and Diego shares with us another cool part of Diego's Wall!

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld     
 
👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback 
 
Welcome and News  - [00:58]

  • MBAS On Demand Sessions: https://mymbas.microsoft.com/home 
  • NASA Mars Helicopter Video Game : https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/edu/learn/project/code-a-mars-helicopter-video-game 
  • Xamarin Community Standup : https://youtu.be/AQHZQ8p6FCA 
What's new in .NET - [05:05]

Student Spotlight - [10:55]

MVP Spotlight - [16:29]

Diego's Wall - [21:27]

item.title: Hello World: Thursday May 6, 2021
item.description:
Great show today with a brand new segment About #VisualStudio tips and tricks! Should we rename Thomas segment #Certification tips and tricks so it? How about ABSee? Is it all Isaac plan with his #Azure Tips and tricks? So much to learn Have a great episode

Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld    

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback  

Welcome and News [00:37]

  • Game Builder Garage: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/game-builder-garage-switch/ 
  • Easily build real-time apps with WebSockets and Azure Web PubSub: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-ca/blog/easily-build-realtime-apps-with-websockets-and-azure-web-pubsub-now-in-preview 
  • NubesGen 
    • blog post Announcing NubesGen, an Open Source tool to automate Azure deployments: https://dev.to/azure/announcing-nubesgen-an-open-source-tool-to-automate-azure-deployments-1l4a 
    • the the official website: https://nubesgen.com/ 
  • Microsoft Business Applications Summit: https://mymbas.microsoft.com/home 
    • Announcement: https://cloudblogs.microsoft.com/dynamics365/bdm/2021/05/04/live-from-microsoft-business-applications-summit-2021-moving-forward-faster-together/ 
  • Microsoft Ability Summit
    • Community Blog Post: 5 Ways To Get The Most Out Of Microsoft Ability Summit 2021 https://assistivetechnologyblog.com/2021/05/5-ways-to-get-the-most-out-of-microsoft-ability-summit-2021.html 

Azure Tips and Tricks [05:06]

  • ​Find out more about Azure Metrics Advisor and other tips at https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks    

Certifications All Up [10:23]

  • Find all certifications at https://aka.ms/learn  

 Visual Studio tips and tricks [15:27]

  • What more videos on: https://aka.ms/vstips 

ABSee [20:57]

#VisualGreenTech:

  • Read our retrospective on the new #VisualGreenTech site
  • Visual Guide: To Sustainability City
  • Get the guide and learn more about Minecraft resources for green tech

 Chat Q&A [26:34]

    Q: Question in Chat - does the snapshotting work with the local Azure Emulator? 

    A: No - the documentation talks about these differences.

item.title: Hello World: Friday April 30, 2021
item.description:
It's Friday on Hello World and we have yet another great show today! Christos Matskas and John Patrick Dandison talked to us about Microsoft Identity, and then we talked to Betsy Weber and AI MVP Ivana Tilca in the MVP Spolitght, with Build 2021 around the corner, Ben Walters shared with us all the handy information about registration and sessions, and Diego Rejtman shared with us another inspiring story from Diego's wall!

Welcome and News [00:41]

Microsoft Identity [05:43]

  • Join our community: https://aka.ms/425Show/Discord  
 
MVP Spotlight [11:14]
  • Learn more about Ivana Tilca's online education journey: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-mvp-award-program-blog/an-online-education-journey-to-new-potential/ba-p/2278014   
  • Ivana Tilca's MVP Profile: https://mvp.microsoft.com/en-us/PublicProfile/5003639?fullName=Ivana%20Antonella%20Tilca    
  • Connect with Ivana: https://linktr.ee/ivanatilca 
 
Build 2021 [16:43]
  • Register at https://mybuild.microsoft.com 
 
Diego's Wall [21:17]

  • Fusion Dev Learning Path: https://aka.ms/fusiondevpath & https://aka.ms/fusiondevbook 

 

File New Project - [04:24]

Today Scott Hanselman speaks with Liz Kenyon, who creates awesome TikTok Videos

You can follow Liz on TikTok and Twitter @liz.kenyon

 

Azure Tips and Tricks - [09:42]

​Find out more about Azure Metrics Advisor and other tips at https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   

Questions: What's the minimum for Azure Metrics Advisor?

Answer: 

So there is a minimum amount. 4 cycles of data if data has seasonality. e.g., weekly pattern, then 4 weeks of data. For high frequency data from sensors, normally they don't have seasonality, and then it'd be 1 hour of data

 

Certifications All Up [14:37] 


AZ900 Certification: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/certifications/exams/az-900 

Find all certifications at https://aka.ms/learn  

 

ABSee - [19:46]


VisualGreenTech:

  • Challenge: https://aka.ms/earthday-visualgreentech 
  • Module: https://aka.ms/visual-greentech 
  • Sessions: https://aka.ms/learn/git  
  • Collection: https://aka.ms/visual/git-learn 

 

Useful Links

  • ‎Hello World on Spotify: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-spotify
  • ‎Hello World on Google Podcasts: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-google
  • ‎Hello World on Apple Podcasts: https://aka.ms/helloworld/podcast-apple

Welcome and News
It's Friday on Hello World and can you believe it we have another great show for you! Today we talked to Elna Sinel & Claire Smyth in the MVP & RD segment, Scott Stanfield returns with 24Hz, Chloe Condon talks to another amazing student, and of course, Diego provides words of wisdom with Diego's wall.

item.title: Hello World: April 1, 2021
item.description:
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld    

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback

Welcome and News

  • A nice post that explains the cloud-native idea and lists sooooo many resources to get started 
  • Meet the Imagine Cup 2021 Top 4 Teams - 19th annual ImagineCup - 4 categories (Earth, Education, Lifestyle, Healthcare) - 40 world finalists heading to World Championships for the Cup! 
  • Minecraft: Education Edition, our game-based learning platform featuring thousands of hours of educational content for students, is launching English-language learning curriculum and expanding on sustainability education for Earth Day 2021. https://education.minecraft.net/

File New Project

  • Ana Kutzner (@kutznera on GitHub)

Tips & Tricks Azure

  • And remember, we have this tip and hundreds more, all on AKA.MS/AzureTipsAndTricks https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks

Certifications at Microsoft

  • You can learn more on https://www.microsoft.com/learn
  • Microsoft Certification Poster http://aka.ms/traincertposter

A-B-See

  • View the guide: GreenTech-1-SustainabilityPrinciples.png (1650×1275) (cloud-skills.dev)
  • Complete the module: https://aka.ms/visual-greentech

It's not a joke, Here are the segment of the day

[05:41] File New Project

item.title: Hello World: Friday, March 26, 2021
item.description:
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/HelloWorld   ​  ​ ​

👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback 
 
Hello world! It's the fantastic Friday edition and we have another great episode in stock for you today!
 
Find out about Sharing is Caring with the MVP Spotlight. Our very own Brian Benz is here to talk about his show, The Launch Space. Chloe Condon brings the education with the Student Ambassadors and of course, Diego Rejtman brings us a piece of inspiration from his wall - in Diego's Wall.
 
Welcome and News
- Hear the developer stories behind some cool Xamarin apps: https://www.theurlist.com/xamarin-dev-stories 
 
MVP Spotlight
- https://twitter.com/bernierh 
- https://twitter.com/DavidWarnerII 
- https://mvp.microsoft.com/en-us/PublicProfile/5003624 
- Sharing is Caring is a PnP initiative that provides hands-on guidance on using and contributing to the Microsoft365 community. https://pnp.github.io/sharing-is-caring/
 
Launch Space
- Watch the Launch Space show, Thursday April 1, 2021, 1PM PST - https://aka.ms/TheLaunchSpacePPSACert 
 
Student Ambassador
- Want to watch Pj's talk? Go to https://aka.ms/confusedwithpj  to learn why confusion is an important part of the process of learning! [NOTE: for social, Pj is @MetzinAround]
 
Diego's Wall
- 💚

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/common/storage-use-azcopy-v10?WT.mc_id=helloworld-17228-cxa

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/visualize/tutorial-logs-dashboards?WT.mc_id=helloworld-17228-cxa

Azure Tips and Tricks, this site is a special collection of tips that span the entire universe of the Azure platform: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks

item.title: Hello World: Friday, March 19, 2021
item.description:
It's Friday on Hello World! And today we have a special guest host April Dunnam and all of the usual great segments - Microsoft MVPs, Student Ambassadors, and Humans of Microsoft.
 
And what piece of inspiration will Diego's wall bring us today?
 
Join the conversation live at https://aka.ms/learnTV  ​ ​
 
👉 Want to influence future Hello World broadcasts? Take 30 seconds to share your feedback with us here: https://aka.ms/HelloWorldFeedback 
 
Welcome and News
- Register and watch all the MS Include sessions at: https://aka.ms/msinclude 
- Let's Learn .NET - Microservices! Follow along and ask instructors questions as you go. Register at: https://letslearndotnet.splashthat.com 
 
MVP Spotlight
- Learn more about Rodrigo Díaz Concha: https://rd.microsoft.com/en-us/rodrigo-diazconcha 
- Rodrigo Díaz Concha's podcast: https://www.facebook.com/interfazpodcast 
 
Student Ambassador
- Explore the endless possibilities of Javascript, Azure Functions, and External APIs with Bit Project, Cloud Advocate Chloe Condon, and our guest Shreya Gupta! https://tinyurl.com/serverlesslive 
 
Humans of Microsoft
- Mike Brown is on Twitter at @browniepoints. Make sure to check Juneteenth conf at https://www.juneteenthconf.com/ 
 
Diego's Wall
- More to come!

item.description:
In this episode Amy and Dean covered their favorite parts of MS Ignite and how Bethesda have joined Team XBox. Jeremiah shared the audiences stories around usage of Active Directory. Jay shared the topic of his Azure Fun Bytes show on Thursday 11 March - machine learning. Kayla Cinnamon, Program Manager on the Windows Terminal team demoed the new features in Windows Terminal Preview 1.7 and we wrapped up with Shiva telling us all about why we should sign up for Microsoft Include on 17 March

item.title: Hello World: Thursday, 4 March 2021
item.description:
After two days of Ignite, it feels good to be back. In today's show we will meet some very inspiring people, learn new Azure tips and tricks, and of course review some Ignite news such as certifications.

Intro and Agenda

  • Book of news
  • Power Automate Desktop

 

File New Project

  • Meet Adesola on Twitter @eyilanke

 

Azure Tips and Tricks

  • Be sure to check out all the @azure #tips and #tricks at http://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks

 

Humans of Microsoft

  • Connect with LaBrina on Twitter @chixcancode !

 

Certifications @ Microsoft

  • Microsoft.com/Learn: https://Microsoft.com/Learn
  • Exciting learning news and opportunities at Microsoft Ignite, March 2-4: https://aka.ms/LearnIgniteAnnouncements_Mar2021

 

Coming Up Next

  • International Women's Day Challenge: https://livecoders.dev/conference
  • Watch: What's New in Visual Studio 2019
  • Share it us your picture/ art/ DYI of Clippy! using the #HelloWorldLive

item.title: Hello World: Friday, Feb 26, 2021
item.description:
It's been an amazing first week of Hello World!

And the last episode of the first week (Friday, February 26, 2021) was action packed! We found out the scoop on Learn Live at Microsoft Ignite. Met an incredible MVP, Mary Thompson who is running a tech hub for disadvantaged women, found out why blue LEDs are the most important human invention ever, and were inspired by Diego's wall.
 
Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you next week!
 
Welcome & Headlines
  • Microsoft Ignite
 
Spotlight: MVP/RD Community
  • Find out more about the Microsoft MVP Award Program and Regional Director Program 
  • Find out more about Mary's Tech Hub for Women 
  • Signup for the App in a Day workshop. aka.ms/AIADEvent  
 
24 Hz
  • To learn more about Autonomous Systems, visit https://innovation.microsoft.com/en-us/autonomous-systems 
 
File New Project
  • Reach out to Nicson Martinez on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicsonm 
 
Diego's Wall
  • Great book: The School of Life: An Emotional Education

 

Episode Segments

[00:00]​ Countdown
[01:09]​ Welcome & Headlines
[06:59] Spotlight: MVP/RD Community
[13:05] ​24 Hz
[19:15]​ File New Project
[25:04]​ Diego's Wall
[29:36] Wrap-up  

 

 ~ Originally air on LearnTV now archived on Ch9

item.title: Hello World! Wednesday Feb, 24
item.description:
On todays episode of HelloWorld we heard all about what's in store for .NET Conf tomorrow (Thursday 23rd February 2021), we reviewed your amazing submissions for the audience challenge: What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why? Had a sneak peek into the next AzureFunBytes episode with Jay Gordon, and wrapped up with Kayla and Demitrius sharing what winget can do! Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you tomorrow.

Show Notes

Welcome & Headlines

  • Microsoft Ignite
  • Microsoft Include 2021
  • Azure Firewall Premium

.NET Conf

  • .Net Conf

Audience Challenge Review

  • Azure Firewall Premium now in preview
  • Azure Firewall documentation
  • Introduction to Azure Firewall

Tips & Tricks AzureFunBytes

  • Learn more about Azure Cosmos DB
  • Check out @AzureFunBytes with @jaydestro every Thursday at 11 AM / 2 PM EST on @LearnTV aka.ms/LearnTV

WinDevBox

  • Install winget as your new package manager

item.title: Hello World! Tuesday Feb, 23
item.description:
On todays episode of HelloWorld we heard more about what's happening in the DAPR space, we ventured into the world of #CodeTok on TikTok an wrapped up with a challenge for you to take part in, What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why?

Thanks for joining us and we hope to see you tomorrow.

  • Microsoft Ignite
  • .NET Conf: https://focus.dotnetconf.net

OSS Spotlight

  • See it all Dapr and Nitya's sketch note: https://aka.ms/hello-dapr

#CodeTok Talk

  • Follow along and find out more at: https://aka.ms/codetok

Audience Challenge

  • Share with us on Twitter: 👉 What's the most ridiculous firewall exception you've ever had to put in place, and why? #HelloWorldChallenge
